cause.description:
This Is For Those People Who Smoke Weed Every Day! Many Other Places Have Already Legalized Marijuana, Why Not Canada? According To The UN Report, Which Is A Staple Of Police Forces Around The World, 16.8% Of Canadians Between The Ages Of 15 And 64 Smoked Pot Or Ingested One Of Its Derivatives Last Year, That's Well Above The World Average Of 3.8% For The Same Demographic And Ahead Of Almost Every Other Country In The World! Wooo Go Canada!!!
1. Legalize Marijuana
cause.name: S.W.E.D
